a.title: covid
a.span: March 14, 2020 Update - Bolton Central School will be cancelling all classes and student activities immediately, through and including Sunday, April 19th as a result of the COVID-19/Corona Virus. Read the full information letter by clicking HERE.

span.span: In response to the POTENTIAL for an extended school closure, Bolton Central School will have a Staff Development Day on Tuesday, March 17th.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

strong.span: Additional information will be provided on Monday, March 16th.

br.a: March 13, 2020 Update - Current cancellations and updated information
